original_text: Then Hoshea son of Elah conspired against Pekah son of Remaliah. He attacked and assassinated him, and then succeeded him as king in the twentieth year of Jotham son of Uzziah.
korean_text: 웃시야의 아들 요담 제이십년에 엘라의 아들 호세아가 반역하여 르말랴의 아들 베가를 쳐서 죽이고 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: conspired against Pekah son of Remaliah
and then succeeded him as king
in the twentieth year of Jotham son of Uzziah
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 웃시야의 아들 요담의 제이십 년이었더라
